titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of, and ansvvered vnto by the churchvvardens and sworne men in the visitation of the right vvorshipfull the archdeacon of Norwich. Anno Domini 1638.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Norwich.

notesStmt.note: Title vignette, a fragment, lozenge containing a fleur-de-lis; initial.
Imperfect: stained, worn, torn, and with irregular and broken type, faded spots and print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
